attributes.action: Introduce victims law & Tag all convicted & registered peados & sexual predators
attributes.additional_details: This will save lives all over the uk and make a huge difference and stop so many people in the UK teenagers children and adults becoming victims in the future ...
attributes.background: This will keep tracks on sexual predators and peadophiles for life and stop them harming so many others

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see electronic tagging of all sexual offenders, but it's not clear what you want to be included in the "victims law" you refer to.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
